titleStmt.title: The muses mistresse, or, A store-house of rich fancies by J.C. ; written at succidanious hours during the action at Newark ; with other high rapsodies, extracted from the choicest wits of our age.
titleStmt.author: Cotgrave, John, fl. 1655.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Cotgrave. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
